title: Senior Trump official says president hasn’t decided when to nominate replacement for Lisa Cook – US politics live
summary: Kevin Hassett commented following reports that Donald Trump had a particular individual in mind for a role, referring to them as a "somebody I like." This statement hints at potential support for the unnamed candidate within Trump's circle. Further details about the identity and position of this person remain unclear.

title: US Open tennis 2025: Raducanu beats Tjen, Norrie and Djokovic in action on day four – live
summary: Daniel Harris provides live updates on a bustling day of events at Flushing Meadows. The report covers various activities taking place at the venue. Stay tuned for the latest developments!

title: The Guardian view on UK attitudes to Europe: Labour is following where it could be leading | Editorial
summary: The editorial highlights the progress made by ministers in advocating for stronger relationships with neighboring countries. However, it suggests that the government could enhance these efforts by acting more decisively and swiftly. Overall, the piece calls for increased courage in diplomatic initiatives.

title: Leicester sack manager Amandine Miquel 11 days before their WSL opener
summary: Leicester City Women have parted ways with manager Amandine Miquel just days before the start of the Women’s Super League. The decision follows a disappointing period leading up to the season. The club is now looking for a new manager to guide the team.

title: Pope demands ‘collective punishment’ end in Gaza as 10 more die of hunger
summary: The Gaza health ministry has reported that the death toll from starvation has reached 313, with 119 of those being children. This tragic development highlights the severe humanitarian crisis in the region. Efforts to address the situation remain critical as conditions worsen.
